snippet: WHITE--Doris, died peacefully at her home in Greenwich Village on June 4th. She is survived by her children Barbara Vlahides and John Vlahides. Services at First Presbyterian Church, 12 W. 12th St., on Wednesday, June 8, 4:30pm. 1/3
lead_paragraph: WHITE--Doris, died peacefully at her home in Greenwich Village on June 4th. She is survived by her children Barbara Vlahides and John Vlahides. Services at First Presbyterian Church, 12 W. 12th St., on Wednesday, June 8, 4:30pm. 1/3
